name: Rough Waters Decentralised Tarots
description:
Hello there Sailor!

The Wet Willy Crew is back for a new Gamejam and present you today our new tarot reading game! Featuring our Voodoo Queen Grace and her legendary sassiness.

Please write us a comment with what she fortelled you, we're really curious of your impressions!

Cards are originally drawn by our designers and will be available through a Kickstarter as a real deck soon!

Be sure to follow @rough_waters_thegame to know all about our next releases!

See ya pirates!
